meta.description:
TLD: NZ
Script Identifier: Latn
Script Description: Latin
Version: 1.0
Effective Date: 26 July 2010
     Registry: .nz Registry Services
Contact: iana@nzrs.net.nz
Address: InternetNZ, Level 9, Grand Arcande Tower 16 Willis Street, Wellington 6011, New Zealand
Telephone: +64 4 472 1600
Website: http://www.dnc.org.nz

Relevant Policy Document URL: http://www.nzrs.net.nz/srs/idn.shtml

This document contains the character table used by .nz Registry Services (New Zealand Registry Services Limited) for the registration of .NZ domains represented using the Latin script. This table is in compliance with the ICANN Guidelines for the Implementation of Internationalised Domain Names and is intended for publication in the IANA IDN Character Table Registry.
